Name: Distant castle
About the game: This is a stand-alone puzzle adventure game with shooting and action elements. Game, you have been transferred to a castle, the castle is chaos, use your wisdom to find your stuff, crack the levels in the castle, beat the final boss, finally win the game. Start your castle adventure. Note: the game is 6 minutes a day, and the game has two endings. It takes about an hour and a half to complete the game, and can switch between the first-person and third-person perspective. ps : When music sounds, you stay at the piano until the end of the song and you will find the crystal. You can use some additional features after you have a mask.(e.q.1.2.key) Remember to turn on the light at night. 2018.5.14 update A second version has been updated to fix most bugs. Storage bugs have been fixed (replaced with automatic archiving). Because I like it very much, I will not adjust the night brightness of the game, as well as the special effects. After death you become a ghost, so you only die once. For my graduation tripï¼ŒI want to transfer this game for money (5000 is ok).
